title: ユリシーズ・ムーアと時の扉 [Yurishizu mua to toki no tobira]
description: Japanese edition of Ulysses Moore Book 1: The Door To Time. After moving into a remote manor, 2 young twins (boy and girl) befriend a local boy and explore the area. They soon discover the manor has many secrets, and that its previous owner, Ulysses Moore had vanished mysteriously. Now they are on an adventure to find the truth. In Japanese. Distributed by Tsai Fong Books, Inc.
author: Mizuhito Kanehara
